name: Map My Locations
author: Lewis King

sections.description:
Show your locations as pins on a map, works with Google Maps or Mapbox.

Create a map and display via a shortcode

  • Light and dark theme options
  • Set map pin/marker colour
  • Toggle a side list of location names and addresses
  • Side list ordering
  • Information popup on pin/marker click with item name, description & location
  • Integrates with either Google Maps, or Mapbox – just enter your API key into the pluign settings page
sections.installation:
1. Upload map-my-locations folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add your map API key in the settings screen
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • First version released!

1.0.1

Fixing a typo on the posts_per_page param, as it was limiting the number of posts to a maximum of 10

1.1

Our new version 1.1 includes a few new features that have been requested by current users & some minor bugfixes.

Bugfixes

  • Cursor now changes to “pointer” when hovering over Google Map Pins/Makers

New features

  • Information popup (on map pin/marker click) – Now includes item title, description & location
  • The ability to set Pin/Marker color per map
  • The ability to set sidebar item ordering

short_description: Show your locations as pins on a map, works with Google Maps or Mapbox, very simple setup with various display options.
